queries.description: Privileged containers lack essential security restrictions and should be avoided by removing the 'privileged' flag or by changing its value to false

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{agent}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{inspector}}.securityContext.privileged is unset or false

queries.query_name: Non Kube System Pod With Host Mount
queries.description: A non kube-system workload should not have hostPath mounted

files.expected_value: Resource name 'agent' of kind 'DaemonSet' in non kube-system namespace 'default' should not have hostPath '/run/containerd/' mounted
files.actual_value: Resource name 'agent' of kind 'DaemonSet' in non kube-system namespace 'default' has a hostPath '/run/containerd/' mounted

files.expected_value: Resource name 'agent' of kind 'DaemonSet' in non kube-system namespace 'default' should not have hostPath '/boot' mounted
files.actual_value: Resource name 'agent' of kind 'DaemonSet' in non kube-system namespace 'default' has a hostPath '/boot' mounted

files.actual_value: Resource name 'agent' of kind 'DaemonSet' in non kube-system namespace 'default' has a hostPath '/proc' mounted

files.actual_value: Resource name 'agent' of kind 'DaemonSet' in non kube-system namespace 'default' has a hostPath '/sys/kernel/debug' mounted

files.actual_value: Resource name 'agent' of kind 'DaemonSet' in non kube-system namespace 'default' has a hostPath '/etc/hostname' mounted

queries.description: Containers should not run with allowPrivilegeEscalation in order to prevent them from gaining more privileges than their parent process

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{controller}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{controller}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false
metadata.name={{webconsole}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{webconsole}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false
metadata.name={{agent}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{inspector}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false
metadata.name={{agent}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{btfhack}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false

queries.description: Container should not share the host process ID namespace

files.expected_value: 'spec.template.spec.hostPID' should be set to false or undefined

queries.query_name: Volume Mount With OS Directory Write Permissions
queries.description: Containers can mount sensitive folders from the hosts, giving them potentially dangerous access to critical host configurations and binaries.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{controller}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{controller}}.volumeMounts.name={{config}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
metadata.name={{agent}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{inspector}}.volumeMounts.name={{hostname}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
metadata.name={{agent}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{btfhack}}.volumeMounts.name={{boot}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
metadata.name={{controller}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{controller}}.volumeMounts.name={{lib}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
metadata.name={{agent}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{inspector}}.volumeMounts.name={{containerd}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
metadata.name={{agent}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{inspector}}.volumeMounts.name={{dockershim}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
metadata.name={{agent}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{btfhack}}.volumeMounts.name={{btf-rawdata}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
metadata.name={{agent}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{inspector}}.volumeMounts.name={{proc}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
metadata.name={{agent}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{inspector}}.volumeMounts.name={{btf-rawdata}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
metadata.name={{agent}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{inspector}}.volumeMounts.name={{config-volume}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true

queries.description: Containers should only run as non-root user. This limits the exploitability of security misconfigurations and restricts an attacker's possibilities in case of compromise

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{webconsole}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{webconsole}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true
metadata.name={{agent}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{btfhack}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true
metadata.name={{controller}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{controller}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true
metadata.name={{agent}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{inspector}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true

queries.description: Check if containers are running with low UID, which might cause conflicts with the host's user table.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{agent}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{btfhack}}.securityContext.runAsUser should be defined
metadata.name={{agent}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{inspector}}.securityContext.runAsUser should be defined
metadata.name={{webconsole}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{webconsole}}.securityContext.runAsUser should be defined
metadata.name={{controller}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{controller}}.securityContext.runAsUser should be defined

queries.description: Memory limits should be defined for each container. This prevents potential resource exhaustion by ensuring that containers consume not more than the designated amount of memory

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{agent}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{btfhack}}.resources.limits.memory should be defined

queries.description: Memory requests should be defined for each container. This allows the kubelet to reserve the requested amount of system resources and prevents over-provisioning on individual nodes

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{agent}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{btfhack}}.resources.requests.memory should be defined

queries.description: Containers should drop 'ALL' or at least 'NET_RAW' capabilities

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{webconsole}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{webconsole}}.securityContext.capabilities.drop should be defined
metadata.name={{controller}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{controller}}.securityContext.capabilities.drop should be defined
metadata.name={{agent}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{btfhack}}.securityContext.capabilities.drop should be defined
metadata.name={{agent}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{inspector}}.securityContext.capabilities.drop should be defined

queries.description: The permission to create pods in a cluster should be restricted because it allows privilege escalation.

files.expected_value: metadata.name=controller.rules.verbs should not contain the value 'create' when metadata.name=controller.rules.resources contains the value 'pods'
files.actual_value: metadata.name=controller.rules.verbs contains the value 'create' and metadata.name=controller.rules.resources contains the value 'pods'

queries.description: Roles or ClusterRoles with RBAC permissions to attach to containers via 'kubectl attach' could be abused by attackers to read log output (stdout, stderr) and send input data (stdin) to running processes. Additionally, it would allow a malicious user to attach to a privileged container resulting in a privilege escalation attack. To prevent this, the 'pods/attach' verb should not be used in production environments

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{controller}}.rules[2].resources should not include the 'pods/attach' resource

queries.description: Roles or ClusterRoles with RBAC permissions to run commands in containers via 'kubectl exec' could be abused by attackers to execute malicious code in case of compromise. To prevent this, the 'pods/exec' verb should not be used in production environments

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{controller}}.rules[2].resources should not include the 'pods/exec' resource

queries.description: Roles or ClusterRoles with RBAC permissions to port-forward into pods can open socket-level communication channels to containers. In case of compromise, attackers may abuse this for direct communication that bypasses network security restrictions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{controller}}.rules[2].resources should not include the 'pods/portforward' resource

queries.description: Check if Readiness Probe is not configured.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{webconsole}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{webconsole}}.readinessProbe should be defined
metadata.name={{agent}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{inspector}}.readinessProbe should be defined
metadata.name={{controller}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{controller}}.readinessProbe should be defined

queries.query_name: Role Binding To Default Service Account
queries.description: No role nor cluster role should bind to a default service account

files.expected_value: subjects.kind=ServiceAccount.name should not be default

queries.description: Containers should be configured with a secure Seccomp profile to restrict potentially dangerous syscalls

metadata.name={{webconsole}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{webconsole}}.securityContext.seccompProfile.type should be defined

queries.query_name: Service Account Token Automount Not Disabled

metadata.name={{webconsole}}.spec.template.spec.automountServiceAccountToken should be defined and set to false

queries.description: CPU limits should be set because if the system has CPU time free, a container is guaranteed to be allocated as much CPU as it requests

files.expected_value: spec.template.spec.initContainers.name=btfhack has resources defined

queries.description: CPU requests should be set to ensure the sum of the resource requests of the scheduled Containers is less than the capacity of the node

files.expected_value: spec.template.spec.initContainers.name=btfhack should have resources defined

queries.query_name: Image Pull Policy Of The Container Is Not Set To Always
queries.description: Image Pull Policy of the container must be defined and set to Always

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{agent}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{btfhack}}.imagePullPolicy should be set to 'Always'
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{agent}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{btfhack}}.imagePullPolicy relies on mutable images in cache

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{webconsole}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{webconsole}}.imagePullPolicy should be set to 'Always'
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{webconsole}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{webconsole}}.imagePullPolicy relies on mutable images in cache

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{controller}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{controller}}.imagePullPolicy should be set to 'Always'
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{controller}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{controller}}.imagePullPolicy relies on mutable images in cache

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{agent}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{inspector}}.imagePullPolicy should be set to 'Always'
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{agent}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{inspector}}.imagePullPolicy relies on mutable images in cache

queries.description: Containers should be configured with an AppArmor profile to enforce fine-grained access control over low-level system resources

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{controller}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{controller}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{controller}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{controller}}

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{agent}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{btfhack}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{agent}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{btfhack}}

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{agent}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{inspector}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{agent}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{inspector}}

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{webconsole}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{webconsole}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{webconsole}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{webconsole}}

queries.description: Sees if Kubernetes Drop Capabilities exists to ensure containers security context

metadata.name={{agent}}.spec.containers.name={{inspector}}.securityContext.capabilities should be set
metadata.name={{webconsole}}.spec.containers.name=webconsole.securityContext should be set
metadata.name={{agent}}.spec.initContainers.name=btfhack.securityContext should be set

queries.description: Each namespace should have a LimitRange policy associated to ensure that resource allocations of Pods, Containers and PersistentVolumeClaims do not exceed the defined boundaries

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{webconsole}} has a 'LimitRange' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{webconsole}} does not have a 'LimitRange' policy associated

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{controller}} has a 'LimitRange' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{controller}} does not have a 'LimitRange' policy associated

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{agent}} has a 'LimitRange' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{agent}} does not have a 'LimitRange' policy associated

queries.description: Each namespace should have a ResourceQuota policy associated to limit the total amount of resources Pods, Containers and PersistentVolumeClaims can consume

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{controller}} has a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{controller}} does not have a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{webconsole}} has a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{webconsole}} does not have a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{agent}} has a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{agent}} does not have a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated

files.actual_value: spec.template.spec.initContainers.name=btfhack does not have a security context

files.expected_value: spec.template.spec.containers.name=controller has a security context
files.actual_value: spec.template.spec.containers.name=controller does not have a security context
